The OIDI Flag

Welcome to the official repository of the International Organization for Identity Documents (OIDI) flag. This page serves as the authoritative source for flag specifications, download links, and usage guidelines.

Flag Variants

Our flag is available in multiple color variants to suit different applications and contexts:

Black Variant

Standard black version for official documents and formal usage.

Download SVG

Navy Variant

Navy blue version for digital applications and web usage.

Download SVG

About OIDI

The International Organization for Identity Documents (OIDI) is a global organization dedicated to establishing and maintaining standards for identity documents worldwide. Our flag represents unity, security, and international cooperation in the field of identity document standards.
